Test Name: Hepatitis B Virus E Antibody (Anti-HBe), Serum
Purpose: To detect antibodies against the Hepatitis B virus e antigen (HBeAg) for accurate patient diagnosis and management.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Anti-HBe ELISA kit with microplate reader (450 nm), incubator, and micropipettes
